subject: Clarification regarding consideration of Widening/ re-construction/ up gradation works on MDRs without loan assistance in Core Sector for the purpose of Bid evaluation- reg.
text: HRi 7itv <f yfetarrut 344 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Tsc @de #(TTrif @Ard4) 547 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 51-5 Q 6, #azr-10, BRa, # ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Standard Documents/2022 Policy Circular No.11.35 dated March, 2022 [Decision taken on e-office File No: NHAI/CMD/HAM/2O2O (Computer No: 46724)] Sub:: Clarification regarding consideration of Widening re-constructionl up gradation works on MDRs  without loan assistance in Core Sector for the purpose of Bid evaluation- reg: It may be mentioned that reference clause 2.2.2.5(iii)(IV) of RFP for EPC projects, widening/ re-construction/ upgradation works o MDRs with loan assistance from multilateral agencies or on BOT Basis constitute projects in Highway Sector for the purpose of consideration under Category 1 or 3 as applicable. However, the works on MDRs without loan assistance are neither covered in Highway sector nor in Core Sector. 2_ Works on MDRs either with loan assistance or without loan assistance do not find place in Highway Sector/ Core Sector in the RFP for HAM projects also. 3 It has been learnt that during the bid evaluation for EPC projects & HAM projects, some Technical Divisions are considering the works o MDRs without loan assistance in Core Sector while others are not considering them neither in Highway Sector and nor in Core Sector. 4  It may be mentioned that reference clause 2.2.2.5(iii) (b) of the RFP for EPC projects and clause 3.4.1(b) of the RFP for HAM projects, core sector would be deemed to include civil construction cost of Power Sector, Commercial Setups (SEZs etc:), airports, industrial parks/ estates, logistic parks, pipelines, irrigation, water supply, sewerage and real estate development: Further reference clause 2.2.2.5(iii) (V) of the RFP for EPC projects, the projects with the title of RIDF PMGSY road; link road, city roads, rural road, sector / municipality road, bridges for railway line, work of metro rails (bridges/ tunnel), real estate projects which demonstrate road development / construction bridges or culverts may be considered under Category 4.
